CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS conversations ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, first_user_id BIGINT, second_user_id BIGINT, last_message_sender_id BIGINT, status_Updated_By_user_id BIGINT, first_user_contact_Name VARCHAR(255), second_user_contact_name VARCHAR(255), status VARCHAR(50), last_message_date DATE, is_read_by_receiver BOOLEAN );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS conversation_messages ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, conversation_id UUID, sender_id BIGINT, payload VARCHAR(1000), message_send_date TIMESTAMP, message_read_date TIMESTAMP, CONSTRAINT fk_conversation FOREIGN KEY (conversation_id) REFERENCES conversations(id) );
